00047 CNWaveEngine * CNWaveEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00048 {
00049     if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == CNWaveEngine::EngineName())
00050         return (CNWaveEngine *)engine;
00051     return NULL;
00052 }

00076 void CNWaveEngine::clear()
00077 {
00078     if (m_pstdMethods != NULL) {delete m_pstdMethods; m_pstdMethods = NULL;}
00079     // Clean up static data.
00080     CNAnalysisMethod::getCelFileParams()->clear();
00081     CNAnalysisMethod::getParams()->clear();
00082 }

00091 /**
00092  * @brief Print any standard methods used by the engine
00093  * @param std::ostream& - The specified output stream
00094  */
00095 void CNWaveEngine::printStandardMethods(std::ostream &out) {
00096     if (m_pstdMethods == NULL) {return;}
00097     std::map<std::string,std::string>::iterator iter;
00098     out << std::endl << "Standard Methods:" << std::endl;
00099       unsigned int maxLength = 0;
00100       for(iter = m_pstdMethods->begin(); iter != m_pstdMethods->end(); iter++) {
00101         if(iter->first.size() > maxLength)
00102           maxLength = (unsigned int)iter->first.size();
00103       }
00104       for(iter = m_pstdMethods->begin(); iter != m_pstdMethods->end(); iter++) {
00105         unsigned int currentLength = 0;
00106         out << " '" << iter->first << "' ";
00107         currentLength = (unsigned int)iter->first.size();
00108         while(currentLength < maxLength + 1) {
00109             out.put(' ');
00110           currentLength++;
00111         }
00112         out << iter->second << std::endl;
00113       }
00114 }

00119 void CNWaveEngine::defineOptions() {
00120 
00121   defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00122   defineOption("", "cn-reference-input", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00123                     "The CN Reference input to the process.",
00124                     "");
00125   defineOption("", "config-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00126                     "The configuration file name as passed from GTC or the Cyto Browser.",
00127                     "");
00128   defineOption("", "cychp-files", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00129                      "Text file specifying cychp files to process, one per line with the "
00130                      "first line being 'cychp_files'.",
00131                      "");
00132 
00133   defineOptionSection("Output Options");
00134   defineOption("", "cn-reference-output", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00135                     "Output CN reference file name.", "");
00136 
00137   defineOptionSection("Analysis Options");
00138   defineOption("a", "analysis", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00139                     "String representing analysis pathway desired.",
00140                     "additional-waves-reference-method");
00141 
00142   defineOptionSection("Misc Options");
00143   defineOption("", "explain", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00144                     "Explain a particular operation (i.e. --explain additional-waves-reference-method).",
00145                     "");
00146 
00147   defineOptionSection("Advanced Options");
00148   defineOption("","xChromosome", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00149                     "X Chromosome",
00150                     "24");
00151   defineOption("","yChromosome", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00152                     "Y Chromosome",
00153                     "25");
00154 
00155   defineOptionSection("Engine Options (Not used on command line)");
00156   defOptMult("", "cychps", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00157                      "CYCHP files to process (cannot be used with the cychp-files option).",
00158                      "");
00159 }

00186 void getCychpFiles(std::vector<std::string> &cychpFiles, BaseEngine *engine) {
00187     if(engine->getOpt("cychp-files")!="") {
00188       affx::TsvFile tsv;
00189 #ifdef WIN32
00190       tsv.m_optEscapeOk = false;
00191 #endif
00192       std::string cychpFilesFile = engine->getOpt("cychp-files");
00193       string file;
00194       tsv.bind(0, "cychp_files", &file, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00195       if(tsv.open(cychpFilesFile) != affx::TSV_OK) {
00196         Err::errAbort("Couldn't open cychp-files file: " + cychpFilesFile);
00197       }
00198       tsv.rewind();
00199       while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00200         cychpFiles.push_back(file);
00201       }
00202       tsv.close();
00203       Verbose::out(1, "Read " + ToStr(cychpFiles.size()) + " cychp files from: " + Fs::basename(cychpFilesFile));
00204     } else {
00205       cychpFiles = engine->getOptVector("cychps");
00206       if(cychpFiles.size() == 0) {
00207         for(vector<const char *>::size_type i = 0; i < engine->getArgCount(); i++)
00208             cychpFiles.push_back(engine->getArg(i));
00209       }
00210     }
00211 
00212 #ifdef WIN32
00213   // Windows doesn't do wildcard expansion in windows, let the user know.
00214   if(cychpFiles.size() > 0 && cychpFiles[0].find("\\*") != string::npos) {
00215     Err::errAbort("Wildcard ('*') expansion not available in windows, please use --cychp-files option.");
00216   }
00217 #endif
00218 
00219 }
00220 
00221 /**
00222  * @brief Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00223  */
00224 void CNWaveEngine::checkOptionsImp() {
00225 
00226     defineStates();
00227 
00228     // file is not used by the engine
00229     //setLibFileOpt("config-file");
00230 
00231     if(getOpt("explain") != "") { explain(); exit(0); }
00232 
00233     checkParameters();
00234     Verbose::out(4, "Parameters are ok.");
00235 
00236     if (getOpt("cn-reference-output") == "") {error("Must specify an cn-reference-output.");}
00237     if (getOpt("temp-dir") == "") { setOpt("temp-dir", Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"),"temp")); }
00238 
00239     if (getOpt("cn-reference-input") != "")
00240     {
00241         if ((!isCyto2Reference(getOpt("cn-reference-input"))) && (!isCopyNumberReference(getOpt("cn-reference-input")))) {error("The cn-reference-input specified either does not exist, or is not the correct type for the CNWaveEngine.");}
00242     }
00243 
00244     if (getOpt("cn-reference-input") == getOpt("cn-reference-output")) {error("The cn-reference-output must not be the same as the cn-reference-input");}
00245 
00246     /* Read in cychp file list from other file if specified. */
00247     vector<string> cychpFiles;
00248     getCychpFiles(cychpFiles, this);
00249     if(cychpFiles.size() == 0)
00250         Err::errAbort("No CYCHP files specified.");
00251     setOpt("cychps",cychpFiles);
00252 
00253     if (Fs::isReadable(getOpt("cn-reference-input")))  {
00254       if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(getOpt("cn-reference-input"))) {Verbose::out(1, "Input reference is in HDF5 format.");}
00255       else {error("cn-reference-input is not in HDF5 file format: " + getOpt("cn-reference-input"));}
00256     }
00257     else {error("Cannot open cn-reference-input: " + getOpt("cn-reference-input"));}
00258     for (unsigned int uiIndex = 0; (uiIndex < getOptVector("cychps").size()); uiIndex++)
00259     {
00260         if (!Fs::fileExists(getOptVector("cychps")[uiIndex]))
00261         {
00262             Err::errAbort("A file specified as a CYCHP input does not exist:\t" + getOptVector("cychps")[uiIndex]);
00263         }
00264     }
00265 }
00266 
00267 /**
00268  * @brief Run the specified analysis
00269  */
00270 void CNWaveEngine::runImp() {
00271   // make this all one big try catch to make sure destructors are
00272   // called if exceptions thrown.
00273   try { // outer try for handling the exception.
00274     try { // inner try for memory clean up.
00275       Fs::ensureWriteableDirPath(getOpt("out-dir"), false);
00276       Fs::ensureWriteableDirPath(getOpt("temp-dir"), false);
00277 
00278         modifyReference();
00279 
00280     } // inner try end
00281     catch (...) {
00282       // Free up any allocated memory here...
00283         clear();
00284       // re-throw the unchanged exception.
00285       throw;
00286     }
00287   } // outer try end
00288   /* When things go wrong see if we can die gracefully here. */
00289   catch(Except &e) {
00290     Verbose::out(0,"");
00291     error("Exception caught. "
00292                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00293   }
00294   catch(const std::bad_alloc &e) {
00295     Verbose::out(0,"");
00296     error("std::bad_alloc caught. "
00297                   "The application has run out of memory. "
00298                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00299   }
00300   catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException &ce) {
00301     Verbose::out(0,"");
00302     error("affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException caught. "
00303                    "Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console library has thrown an exception. "
00304                   "Message is: " + affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ce.Description()));
00305   }
00306   catch(BroadException &e) {
00307     Verbose::out(0,"");
00308     error("BroadException caught. "
00309                   "Message is: '" + ToStr(e.m_msg) + "' source file: '" + ToStr(e.m_sourcefile) +
00310                   ":" + ToStr(e.m_sourceline) + "'");
00311   }
00312   catch(const std::exception &e) {
00313     Verbose::out(0,"");
00314     error("std::exception caught. "
00315                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00316   }
00317   catch(const BaseException &e) {
00318     Verbose::out(0,"");
00319     error("newmat BaseException caught. "
00320                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00321   }
00322   catch(...) {
00323     Verbose::out(0,"");
00324     error("Unknown exception caught. "
00325                   "No message is available.");
00326   }
00327   // free any allocated memory here...
00328   clear();
00329 }
00330 
00331 void CNWaveEngine::modifyReference()
00332 {
00333     Verbose::out(1, "*");
00334     CNAnalysisMethodFactory amFactory(true);
00335     CNAnalysisMethod* am = NULL;
00336     am = amFactory.CNAnalysisMethodForString(getOpt("analysis"));
00337     am->setEngine(this);
00338     am->run();
00339     delete am;
00340     Verbose::out(1, "*");
00341 }

00344 // This method is called by ChAS without having called checkOptions.
00345 // In short, best not to refer to Engine options/state in this method
00346 AffxString CNWaveEngine::getAnnotationParameter(const AffxString& strFileName, const AffxString& strParameterName)
00347 {
00348     AffxString strParameterValue;
00349     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName))
00350     {
00351         AffxString str;
00352         try
00353         {
00354             affx::File5_File file5;
00355             file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00356             affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("Cyto2", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00357             if (group5 != NULL)
00358             {
00359             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Parameters", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00360             if (tsv5 != NULL)
00361             {
00362             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00363             {
00364                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &str);
00365                 int iIndex = str.indexOf("=");
00366                 if (str.startsWith("#%" + strParameterName + "=")) {strParameterValue = str.substring(iIndex + 1);}
00367             }
00368             tsv5->close();
00369             delete tsv5;
00370             }
00371             group5->close();
00372             delete group5;
00373             }
00374             file5.close();
00375         } catch(...) {return "";}
00376     }
00377     return strParameterValue;
00378 }

00380 // This method is called by ChAS without having called checkOptions.
00381 // In short, best not to refer to Engine options/state in this method
00382 bool CNWaveEngine::isCyto2Reference(const AffxString& strReferenceFileName)
00383 {
00384     int i = 0;
00385     try {i = affx::File5_Tsv::getFileTsvLineCount(strReferenceFileName, "Cyto2", "MedianSignals");}
00386     catch (...) {i = 0;}
00387     return (i > 0);
00388 }
00389 
00390 bool CNWaveEngine::isCopyNumberReference(const AffxString& strReferenceFileName)
00391 {
00392     int i = 0;
00393     try {i = affx::File5_Tsv::getFileTsvLineCount(strReferenceFileName, "CopyNumber", "Reference");}
00394     catch (...) {i = 0;}
00395     return (i > 0);
00396 }

00398 void CNWaveEngine::explain() {
00399     CNAnalysisMethodFactory factory (true);
00400     std::vector<SelfDoc>docs = factory.getDocs();
00401 
00402     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < docs.size(); i++)
00403     {
00404         if(docs[i].getDocName() == getOpt("explain"))
00405         {
00406             SelfDoc::printExplanation(docs[i],cout);
00407         }
00408     }
00409     docs.clear();
00410 }

00412 void CNWaveEngine::extraHelp() {
00413     CNAnalysisMethodFactory factory(true);
00414     printStandardMethods(cout);
00415     EngineUtil::printSelfDocs("Data transformations:", factory.getDocs());
00416 }
